subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick stirred up memories of his run to the United States Open title in 2003 as he advanced to the semifinals while the unseeded Mikhail Youzhny upset No. 2 Rafael Nadal.
snippet: Andy Roddick stirred up memories of his run to the United States Open title in 2003 as he advanced to the semifinals while the unseeded Mikhail Youzhny upset No. 2 Rafael Nadal.
